universal_features.name: Bet Simulator
universal_features.description: A feature that allows users to place simulated bets and track their performance without financial risk.

universal_features.name: Betting Odds Comparison
universal_features.description: Compare odds from different bookmakers to find the best value for each bet across various platforms.

universal_features.name: Expert Tips and Predictions
universal_features.description: Receive actionable, event-specific betting tips and outcome predictions from experts, focused on practical advice for upcoming matches and markets.

universal_features.name: Bankroll Management Tools
universal_features.description: Tools to help users track their betting history, manage their bankroll, and set limits to promote responsible gambling.

universal_features.name: Trend and News Alerts
universal_features.description: Real-time notifications about significant betting trends, injuries, and news influencing betting decisions.

universal_features.name: Community Forum
universal_features.description: A space for users to discuss strategies, share insights, and connect with other bettors regardless of experience.

universal_features.name: Custom Betting Strategies
universal_features.description: Personalized recommendations and templates for betting strategies based on user profiles and previous betting performance.

universal_features.name: Scenario Analysis
universal_features.description: Analyze various betting scenarios and receive feedback from the app on the likelihood of success.
